description: This file implements the Wi-Fi hardware abstraction layer (HAL) for a broadband device, providing functions for initializing, configuring, managing APs and radios, gathering statistics, and controlling security features. It includes many stub implementations that return success but do not perform actual hardware operations.

methods.name: INT wifi_createAp(INT apIndex,INT radioIndex,CHAR * essid,BOOL hideSsid)
INT wifi_dppCreateCSignIntance(INT dppVapIndex,CHAR * PrivateSigningKey,void ** csign_inst,unsigned char * sign_key_hash)
INT wifi_dppCreateReconfigContext(INT dppVapIndex,CHAR * PrivateReconfigAccessKey,void ** reconf_ctx,char * reconf_pub_key)
INT wifi_dppProcessReconfigAnnouncement(UCHAR * frame,UINT len,unsigned char * sign_key_hash)
INT wifi_dppStartReceivingTestFrame(unsigned char * sign_key_hash1,unsigned char * sign_key_hash2)
INT wifi_getApBridgeInfo(INT index,CHAR * bridgeName,CHAR * IP,CHAR * subnet)
INT wifi_getApSecurityAcctServer(INT apIndex,CHAR * IP_output,UINT * Port_output,CHAR * AcctSecret_output)

ctags.name: wifi_createAp
ctags.pattern: /^INT wifi_createAp(INT apIndex, INT radioIndex, CHAR *essid, BOOL hideSsid)$/
